trigger: Smart Home Security night mode activated
trigger_description: This trigger fires when the home security device enters Night mode.

trigger: Smart Home Security Outdoor Motion Viewer activated
trigger_description: This trigger fires when a Honeywell Homes Outdoor Motion Viewer is activated.

trigger: Smart Home Security away mode activated
trigger_description: This trigger fires when the home security device enters Away mode.

trigger: Smart Home Security home mode activated
trigger_description: This trigger fires when the home security device enters Home mode
This trigger fires when the system detects a water leak.
This trigger fires when the home security device alarm has been activated
This trigger fires when the system detects a sound camera event.

trigger: Smart Home Security off mode activated
trigger_description: This trigger fires when the home security device enters Off mode.
This trigger fires when the system detects a motion camera event.
